REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1043 reute b f BC-ENEL-ISSUES-15-BILLIO 04-13 0102

TEXT.TITLE: ENEL ISSUES 15 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Italy's state-owned Ente Nazionale per l'Energia Elettrica (ENEL) is issuing a 15 billion yen eurobond due May 27, 1994 paying 4-3/4 pct and priced at 101-7/8 pct, joint-lead bookrunner IBJ International Ltd said. Morgan Stanley International is the other joint-lead bookrunner and appears on the left in documentation. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The payment date is May 27. REUTER
